projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: yasyātyantaṃ cirapariṇater naiva niryāti rāgaḥ // KAvk_10.2 //
puṃsaḥ śukraṃ vigalitadhṛter ārtavaṃ yoṣitaś ca
ekībhūtaṃ vrajati niyamāt kasya cid bījabhāvaṃ
yo 'ntas tasmin bhavati sahasā saṃnikāṣe yathāgniḥ // KAvk_10.3 //
puṣpāmodas tilaṃ iva śanaiḥ kāñcanaṃ vāgnitāpaḥ /
so 'yaṃ garbhaṃ viśati niyatair apy asaṃlakṣyavṛttir
vāyur gandhair iva bahuvidhaiḥ karmabhir vāsyamānaḥ // KAvk_10.4 //
kaṃ cit kālaṃ vahati vikṛtiṃ nirvikārāyamāno
māyūrāṇḍe jalamaya iva vyaktabhaktir mayūraḥ // KAvk_10.5 //
kleśaṃ bhuṅkte kim api viṣamaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāprapannaḥ // KAvk_10.6 //
kāle vṛntāt svayaṃ iva phalaṃ vicyutaṃ karmapākāt
niryāty antaḥ śara iva dhanuryantraṇair yantramuktaḥ // KAvk_10.7 //

body.p:
uttānāsyaḥ saralarasanaś cūcukāgraṃ lihānaḥ stanyaṃ mātuḥ pibati yad asau naiva karṇena nākṣṇā / janmābhyāsavyasanayatanāyāsasaṃvāsalinā
sā tasyāgre sakalakalanādeśini vāsanaiva // KAvk_10.8 //

lg.l: kaṃ bobrūte viṣamavipadām āspadatvaṃ prayātaḥ // KAvk_10.10 //
janmāvartaṃ nijaṃ iva likhan dīrghaṃ oṃkāram ādau
varge varge vitarati matiṃ bhogasarge niviṣṭaḥ // KAvk_10.12 //
kāmautsukyāt punar api pare yauvane naṣṭasaṃjñaḥ /
badhnāty āsthāṃ sthirataradhiyā yoṣitāṃ vibhrameṣu // KAvk_10.13 //
vāci śrotraṃ vapur api calāliṅganeṣv aṅganānāṃ
pātre kurvan dṛśam api mukhe suptasarvakriyo 'sau
prāptaṃ nāsmin vapuṣi sukṛtaṃ naiva dattaṃ na bhuktaṃ /
itthaṃ caurair iva sa muṣitaś cintayaty eva duḥkhāt
rājyabhraṃśe nṛpa iva sukhaṃ so 'tha śocaty atītaṃ // KAvk_10.19 //

body.p:
āyur nītaṃ na ca samucitaṃ yācakāyopanītaṃ
nāpy unnītaṃ diśi diśi yaśaḥ satpathaṃ na pratītaṃ
pītaṃ yācñāviṣam adhigataṃ sphītasaṃtāpaśītaṃ
bhītaṃ pāpāt kim api na mayā yat tad eva praṇītaṃ // KAvk_10.20 //

lg.l: śuṣkaṃ śītaṃ tarum iva vane vānaraṃ māṃ vadanti // KAvk_10.21 //
so 'yaṃ kāyaḥ śrayati vilayaṃ naiva māyānikāyaḥ
srastāḥ sarve daśanamaṇayas te ca keśāḥ na doṣāḥ /
śakticchedād ṛṇaṃ iva mahat prāptakālo daridraḥ // KAvk_10.23 //
bhūmiṃ gehaṃ vasu parijanaṃ putradārādi cānyat
yāvaj janmany api punar asau snehamohānubandhais
tais tair antaḥ kṛtaparicayas tanmayībhāvam eti // KAvk_10.24 //
yad vā puṇyakalārjitaṃ sukhapadaṃ tat saṃkṣaye duḥkhadaṃ

body.p: / iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ garbhāvakrāntinirdeśo nāma daśamaḥ pallavaḥ /
